dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1815 IS: Occupational Therapy in Mental Health Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Begich introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to include occupational therapists as behavioral and mental health professionals for purposes of the National Health Service Corps.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Occupational Therapy in Mental Health Act .

section.header: Including occupational therapists as behavioral and mental health professionals for purposes of the National Health Service Corps
section.text: Section 331(a)(1)(E)(i) of the Public Health Service Act ( 42 U.S.C. 254d(a)(1)(E)(i) ) is amended by inserting occupational therapists, after psychiatric nurse specialists,.
